comments.body: This looks like you probably just copied it from upstream without making any changes (e.g. we donâ€™t have a package called `base`). Totally fine for now but it would be good to add a comment on where you copied it from.
I absolutely have copied it from upstream. The program (and the official `hlint` binary) falls over very quickly if it can't locate this file.

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,967 @@
+# hlint configuration file
+# ==================================
+
+# The hlint tool is mainly automatic, but some hints/restrictions can be specified here.
+
+- package:
